DOC.brief_summary: This interventional study seeks to evaluate the overall outcomes of a novel, emotional awareness intervention for people with chronic musculoskeletal pain and determine which patients benefit the most from this intervention. The investigators also are evaluating the effects of brief emotional communication technique embedded in the pre-treatment assessment.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating a Chronic Pain Treatment Program
DOC.criteria: Adults with chronic musculoskeletal pain, not accounted for by disease or tissue pathology, who are seeking or referred for this psychological treatment program Autoimmune diseases Cancer pain Illiterate Cognitively impaired Too medically ill
